bullets.title: Deleting a tree makes permanent changes to your project
bullets.item: The relationship properties for that tree will be deleted from cards.
Deleted properties cannot be recovered and will no longer be displayed in history.
Favorites / tabs that use this tree or the deleted properties will also be deleted.
Transitions that use this tree or deleted properties will also be deleted.
Wiki pages and tables/charts that reference the deleted properties will no longer work.

section.title: Navigate to the Card trees page...

steps.item: Sign in to Mingle as a project administrator and open the project in which you want to create a card tree (if you're not already working in the project).

item.p: Mingle displays the Project settings page.
item.note: If you are logged in as a project team member, Mingle displays the Team page. You need to log in as a Project admin to create trees.

item.p: Click the Card trees link. Mingle displays the Card trees page with all trees setup for this project.

section.title: Delete the card tree...
section.p: Click the Delete link next to the card tree you wish to delete. Mingle displays the Confirm tree deletion page.
section.warning: The Confirm tree deletion page will provide feedback on the impact of deleting the tree. You should read the warning carefully before continuing.

section.title: Save your work...
section.p: Click the Continue to delete link to delete the card tree. Mingle will return you to the card trees page
